None.Name: Blessed Winterfall
None.Description: Activate to cast an icy aura on every friendly building in the current game that freezes all enemy units within a 20m radius for 10 seconds. Lasts for 15 seconds. Has a 60 seconds cool-down after having been built. Reusable every 60 seconds.
